::Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder looks to the shuttle controller.
=A0
Elder: Transf=
er any nonessential power to the weapons and shields. Get them replenished =
as soon as possible.
=A0
Elder returns to the open channel with Legacy.
=A0=

Elder: The Ark should still have the armor plating and sentinel autoguns t=
hat Optimus Primal's Maximals put in place.

--- On Tue, 7/1/08, supercyclo=
nus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@ya=
hoo.com>
Subject: Re: At The Ark
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, =
July 1, 2008, 7:00 AM






--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups. com, Richard Allen <=
roborick007@ ...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord Elder::
> =A0
> Elder: I agree,
> =A0
>=
 Elder turns to the pilot.
> =A0
> Elder: Turn us about. We are returning t=
o Mt. St. Hillary.
> =A0
> The pilot nods and turns the shuttle so it is on=
ce again in route 
to the Ark.

As the Maximal shuttle turned back towards =
the Ark, Legacy's large 
boosters bring him back in line with it. "PREDICAT=
ABLY IT WILL NOT 
TAKE LONG FOR CYCLONUS TO ARRIVE AT THE ARK. THE MOST LOG=
ICICAL 
COURSE OF ACTION WOULD BE TO RECHARGE YOUR ENERGY STORES AND BRING =

ONLINE THE ARK'S DEFESIVE MEASURES."

((OOC: I think in the show I remembe=
r something like that? Primal had 
shielding or something up?? I cannot cle=
arly remember.))

As Legacy and the shuttle turn around allowing Nightstrik=
e and 
Darkfate to continue on unmolested, in the distance in front of the =

Minion duo a dark form seemed to almost materialize out of thin air 
as th=
ey flew toward it: Nightrazor!

"I bring you greetings from Cyclonus" the d=
ark minion transmitted to 
Darkfate and his companion. "There is war brewin=
g over the ark. 
Prepare yourselves!"

Preston
(Legacy & Nightrazor)

 



=

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Lord Elder::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder looks to the shuttle controller.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder: Transfer any nonessential power to the weapons and shields. Get them replenished as soon as possible.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder returns to the open channel with Legacy.</P>
<P> </P>
